summary.description: A brief summary or description of the discount code

starts_at.description: The date and time when the discount code is activated.

usage_limit.description: The maximum number of times that the discount can be used.

code.description: The discount code that customers can use during checkout to apply the discount

price_rule_id.description: The identifier of the price rule associated with the discount code

created_at.description: The date and time when the discount code was created

discount_type.description: The type of discount applied by the discount code, such as a percentage or fixed amount off

async_usage_count.description: The number of times that the discount has been used.

usage_count.description: The number of times the discount code has been used by customers

applies_once_per_customer.description: Whether the discount can be applied only once per customer.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the discount code was last updated

createdBy.description: The application that created the discount reedem code.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the discount code is applicable

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the discount code in the Shopify Admin GraphQL API

id.description: The unique identifier for the discount code

ends_at.description: The date and time when the discount code is deactivated.

total_sales.description: The total sales from orders where the discount was used.

codes_count.description: The number of redeem codes for the discount.
